title: Payanam A Love Journey Song Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Vidiyalil varum velicham nee
Kodiyinil sirumalarum naan
Dhinam dhinam naan sirippadhum unnaalae
Kadal karai tharum alaigal nee
Karaiyinil siru pavalam naan
Tholaivadhum karai servadhum unnaalae

You are the light that comes at dawn
I am the little flower on the vine
Every day, I smile because of you
You are the waves the sea gives the shore
I am the tiny coral on the beach
Getting lost and reaching the shore is all because of you


Idhuvarai naan endrumae thayakkam kondadhu illai
Mudhalmurai un paarvaiyaal naan thadumaari ponaen
Thuligalaai naan pogiraen naan ennidam illai endru sollugiraen

Until now, I have never felt any hesitation
For the first time, I stumbled because of your gaze
I am drifting away like droplets, saying that I am no longer myself


En payanam nee endrae enil
Ini neeyum naanum inaindhu kalandhu pogalaam
Kaatril kaigal korthu parandhu pogalaam
Kaalam naeram marandhu tholaindhu pogalaam
Pagalum iravum ingae marandhu pogalaam

If you are my journey
Then let us join together and drift away
Let's hold hands and fly in the wind
Let's lose track of time and get lost
Let day and night be forgotten here


Thooralgal thoorida suvaasa kaatrum kulirndhida
Arugil nee nindrida uraindhu naan pogiraen
Ennavo en manam kuzhandhai polae maarudhae
Ummai pol pidivaadhamaai unnai kaetkiradhae

As the drizzle falls and the air I breathe turns cold
With you standing near, I am frozen in place
Somehow my heart is turning like a child
Stubbornly asking for you, just like you


Kaadhal kadhaigal verum kaagidhamaai irundha ennil
Maatram thandhaai needhaanae
Vetkam ariyaa ennai nee maara seidhaayae

In me, where love stories were just paper
You are the one who brought a change
You made me change, who didn't know what shyness was

Kaatril kaigal korthu parandhu pogalaam
Kaalam naeram marandhu tholaindhu pogalaam
Pagalum iravum ingae marandhu pogalaam

Then let us join together and drift away
Let's hold hands and fly in the wind
Let's lose track of time and get lost
Let day and night be forgotten here

Kodiyinil sirumalarum naan
Dhinam dhinam naan sirippadhum unnaalae
Kadal karai tharum alaigal nee
Karaiyinil siru pavalam naan
Tholaivadhum karai servadhum unnaalae

You are the light that comes at dawn
I am the little flower on the vine
Every day, I smile because of you
You are the waves the sea gives the shore
I am the tiny coral on the beach
Getting lost and reaching the shore is all because of you


Ulagam vizhudhudhae aedho indru uyir aadudhae
Aedho solludhae en payanam nee endru

The world is waking up, somehow my soul is dancing today
Something is saying that you are my journey
